definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me a cuckold?
sentences.chinese: 你就是让我戴绿帽子的文员？

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold .
sentences.chinese: 亚瑟王本人被描绘成一个被人戴绿帽子的软弱之人。

sentences.english: He was cuckolded by his best friend.
sentences.chinese: 他最好的朋友给他戴了绿帽子。

sentences.english: Must he be a cuckold for the rest of his life?
sentences.chinese: 他这辈子都得戴绿帽子吗？

sentences.english: You believe she cuckolded her husband?
sentences.chinese: 你相信她给他丈夫戴了绿帽子？

sentences.english: Thus, few manufacturers supply green hats or scarves.
sentences.chinese: 所以，生产商都不怎么生产绿头巾和绿帽子。

sentences.english: Arthur himself has been portrayed as a weak cuckold.
sentences.chinese: 亚瑟王本人被描绘成一个被人戴绿帽子的软弱之人。

sentences.english: Were you the clerk that is to make me cuckold ?
sentences.chinese: 你就是那个给我戴绿帽子的助手？

sentences.english: You should keep your wife under control, aren't you afraid of being cuckolded ?
sentences.chinese: 你也不管管你媳妇，就不怕戴绿帽子？

sentences.english: Matt: I don't wanna be a chump .
sentences.chinese: 我不想当戴绿帽子的傻瓜。

sentences.english: Can't be a so fierce and ruddy good Tong surname almond wall to call four the elder brother took a cuckold husband?
sentences.chinese: 不会是佟佳氏这么猛红杏出墙叫四阿哥带绿帽子了吧？

definition: a cuckold/to be cuckolded by one's wife
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
derailment (railway accident)/to leave the rails/fig. to overstep bounds/fig. to have an extramarital affair
mistress/the other woman (coll.)/grade 3 in elementary school
(of a woman) to take a lover
to carry on a clandestine love affair
green headband (to visit a Yuan dynasty brothel)/cuckold
